summary.span: 基本设计器类，用于扩展根设计文档中支持嵌套组件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为支持嵌套组件的根设计文档的设计器提供基类。 provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components. 除了从类继承的方法和功能以外 ，还 实现接口， 为关联的组件和任何嵌套的组件提供根级别设计模式视图。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, implements the interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components. > [!NOTE] > 或的根级别设计模式视图 通常由内置根设计器提供。The root-level design mode view for a or is typically provided by a built-in root designer. 需要自定义 实现才能在设计模式下为其他类型的根组件提供视图。A custom implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode. 可以使用将设计器与类型相关联 。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅 [扩展设计时支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

Protected Overridable Function GetToolSupported (tool As ToolboxItem) As Boolean
abstract member GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool override this.GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool

param.name: tool
param.span: 要对其进行工具箱支持测试的 。

span.span: The to test for toolbox support.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否支持指定工具。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

returns.span: 如果应在工具箱上启用该工具，则为 ；如果文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具，则为 。

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持某一工具，则当设计器重新获得焦点时，它将在 "工具箱" 中启用。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus. 否则，将禁用该功能。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 将工具标记为启用或禁用后，就不能再对其进行查询。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 接口方法重写会 `boolean` 在设计时向此设计器的组件添加一个名为 "TrayLargeIcon" 的不可浏览、仅设计时属性。This interface method override adds a non-browsable, design-time only `boolean` property named "TrayLargeIcon" to this designer's component at design time. 组件栏使用此属性。This property is used by the component tray.
